title: Managing Your Money:  Investing Lessons from Warren Buffett
description: Bestselling author Robert G. Hagstrom, CIO and a senior portfolio manager at EquityCompass, speaks with Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster about the investing mindset and ideas that have shaped Warren Buffett’s legendary career and shares take-aways from the 2022 Berkshire Hathaway shareholder meeting along with his outlook on financial markets.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
